metadata.name: Gamer's Nest
metadata.description:
"Gamer's Nest" is an esoteric mélange of neon chaos and digital serenity. Fractals of luminous anime creatures traverse labyrinthine circuitry, creating a cosmic carnival of pixels.

In the epicentre, sits the gamer, a tranquil deity amidst the chaos. Their throne, an organic-electronic fusion, suggests a nest — a sanctuary within the sprawling electronic Eden. "Gamer's Nest" presents a curious paradox: a reality that's both our escapist fantasy and electronic entrapment.

Artwork information:
Digital animation (mp4)
Frame Rate: 30 fps
duration: 33 sec
resolution: 720p
